info.description: This is a service for running Techno-Economic Assessment (TEA) API, funded by California Energy Commission.
info.title: Techno-Economic Assessment

tags.name: TEA
tags.description: Find out the orginal excel spreadsheets in [California Biomass Collaborative](https://biomass.ucdavis.edu/tools/energy-cost-calculator/)

post.description: This route is used for generic-power-only (GPO) model
This route is used for generic-combine-heat-power (CHP) model
This route is used for gasification-power (GP) model
This route is used for hydrogen model

TaxCreditFrac.description: Tax Credit Schedule -> Fraction is 1 if received in year, 0 if not
Tax Credit Schedule -> Fraction is 1 if received in year, 0 if not
Tax Credit Schedule -> Fraction is 1 if received in year, 0 if not

OperatingExpensesRate.description: Operating expenses rate (% of capital investment)

ElectricalEnergy.description: Other Revenues or Cost Savings -> Electrical energy ($/year)

IncentivePayments.description: Other Revenues or Cost Savings -> Incentive payments ($/year)

Capacity.description: Other Revenues or Cost Savings -> Capacity ($/year)

Heat.description: Other Revenues or Cost Savings -> Heat ($/year)

Residues.description: Other Revenues or Cost Savings -> Residues ($/year)

NegativeTaxesOffset.description: Negative taxes allowed to offset taxes elsewhere? true if yes, false if no

OneYearDebtReserveRequired.description: One year debt reserve required? true if yes, false if no

MARR.description: Minimum attractive rate of return on equity (MARR) (%/year)

TaxCreditFrac.description: Tax Credit Schedule -> Fraction is 1 if received in year, 0 if not

GasifierSystemCapitalCost.description: Gasifier and Feedstock Handling System Capital Cost ($)

NetElectricalCapacity.description: Size of plant based on net power output to grid (kWe)

CapacityFactor.description: Annual fraction that rated capacity is available from plant (%)

MoistureContent.description: Moisture Content of Biomass Feedstock (% wet basis)

NetStationEfficiency.description: Ratio of net energy output from plant to fuel energy input to plant (%)

FuelHeatingValue.description: Higher heating value (heat of combustion) of fuel expressed on a wet basis input in SI units (kJ/kg)

FuelAshConcentration.description: Fraction of ash in fuel, percent dry basis (%)

HHVEfficiency.description: HHV Efficiency of Gasification System--Biomass to Clean Gas (%)

NetHHVEfficiency.description: Net HHV Efficiency of Power Generation incl. Dual Fuel (%)

FractionOfInputEnergy.description: Dual Fuel -> Fraction of Input Energy (%)

CO.description: Clean Gas Composition -> CO (% by volume, dry)

H2.description: Clean Gas Composition -> H2 (% by volume, dry)

Hydrocarbons.description: Clean Gas Composition -> Hydrocarbons (as CH4) (% by volume, dry)

CO2.description: Clean Gas Composition -> CO2 (% by volume, dry)

O2.description: Clean Gas Composition -> O2 (% by volume, dry)

HHV.description: Higher Heating Value of Biomass Feedstock to Gasifier (kJ/kg)

AshContent.description: Ash Content of Biomass (% dry matter)

CarbonConcentration.description: Carbon Concentration of Char (% dry basis)

AggregateFractionOfHeatRecovered.description: Fraction of total heat production available for sale (%)

LaborCost.description: Cost of labor to operate facility ($/year)

InsurancePropertyTax.description: Cost of insurance for the plant plus any property or other local taxes ($/year)

Utilities.description: Purchased utilities including power, gas, water, waste disposal ($/year)

Management.description: Cost for administrative personnel and other administration ($/year)

OtherOperatingExpenses.description: All other expenses for operating the plant, for example natural gas not included in utilities, chemicals, or additives ($/year)

AshDisposal.description: Cost of ash disposal from plant ($/year), use negative value when ash is sold at value

DualFuelCost.description: Dual Fuel Cost ($/L) * Default assumes heavy diesel fuel

ProductionTaxCredit.description: Production Tax Credit on electrical energy (%)

DebtRatio.description: Fraction of financing covered by debt borrowing (%)

InterestRateOnDebt.description: Interest rate applied to debt portion of investment (%/year).  Value must be non-zero

CostOfEquity.description: Rate of return on equity portion of investment (%/year)

CapacityPayment.description: Payment made from power purchaser if plant can guarantee capacity (depends on contract) ($/kW-year)

InterestRateOnDebtReserve.description: Interest income earned on reserve account if financing institution requires security deposit (%/year)

GeneralInflation.description: Overall inflation rate used to adjust current dollar result to constant dollars (%)

EscalationBiomassFuel.description: Rate at which fuel cost escalates over time (%)

EscalationProductionTaxCredit.description: Specified index for production tax credit (%)

EscalationHeatSales.description: Escalation rate applied to heat sales (%/year)

EscalationOther.description: Rate at which other expenses escalate over time (%)

EscalationDualFuel.description: Rate at which dual fuel cost escalates over time (%/year)

EscalationCharSales.description: Escalation rate applied to sales of char or ash (%/year)

Biomass Target.description: This is the same as AnnualFuelConsumption for GPO and CHP, and AnnualBiomassConsumptionDryMass for GP

CapitalCostNEC.description: Capital cost per net electrical capacity ($/kWe)

ParasiticLoad.description: Electrical power used to operate facility (kWe)
Electrical power used to operate system (kWe)

OverallNetSystemEfficiency.description: Overall system efficiency (%) -> biomass into gasifier to electricity

AnnualCleanGasConsumption.description: Annual Clean Gas Consumption (dry metric tons/year)

DualFuelFlowRate.description: Dual Fuel Flow Rate (L/h) * Default assumes heavy diesel fuel

LaborCostKwh.description: Cost of labor to operate facility ($/kWh-net electrical)

MaintenanceCostKwh.description: Cost of maintaining the plant ($/kWh-net electrical)

InsurancePropertyTaxKwh.description: Cost of insurance for the plant plus any property or other local taxes ($/kWh-net electrical)

UtilitiesKwh.description: Purchased utilities including power, gas, water, waste disposal ($/kWh-net electrical)

ManagementKwh.description: Cost for administrative personnel and other administration ($/kWh-net electrical)

OtherOperatingExpensesKwh.description: All other expenses for operating the plant, for example natural gas not included in utilities, chemicals, or additives ($/kWh-net electrical)

AshDisposalKwh.description: Cost of ash disposal from plant ($/kWh-net electrical), use negative value when ash is sold at value

BiomassFuelCostKwh.description: Cost of biomass fuel for gasifier ($/kWh-net electrical)

CombinedTaxRate.description: Combined federal and state tax rate to which project is subject (%)

LACcurrent.description: Current $ Level Annual Cost of Energy ($/kWh)

LACconstant.description: Constant $ Level Annual Cost of Energy ($/kWh)

EquityRatio.description: Fraction of financing covered by corporate investment (%)

CostOfMoney.description: Weighted cost of investment for full investment including both debt and equity (%/year)

AnnualEquityRecovery.description: Uniform annual revenue required to earn stipulated rate of return on equity ($/year)

AnnualDebtPayment.description: Uniform annual payment needed to pay off debt ($/year)

DebtReserve.description: Funds placed in reserve account as security deposit ($).  Sometimes required by financing institution to ensure debt repayment if plant operation is stopped for some period, typically up to one year

CurrentLACofEnergy.description: Current $ Level Annual Cost of Energy ($/kWh)

ConstantLACofEnergy.description: Constant $ Level Annual Cost of Energy ($/kWh)

TotalHeatProductionRate.description: Total heat production rate equal to fuel power less gross electrical power (kWth)

HeatIncomePerUnitNEE.description: Heat income per unit net electrical energy ($/kWh-net)

TotalFacilityCapitalCost.description: Total installed cost of plant including electrical plus heat recovery and distribution ($)

GasifierSystemCapitalCostPerKwe.description: Gasifier and Feedstock Handling System Capital Cost ($/kWe-net)
